import React from 'react' import { EditIcon, MenuIcon } from '../icons' import { TableCell, TableRow, Button, } from '@windmill/react-ui' export class Account extends React.Component { // TODO: Use setters (check non-empty string) and event handlers to update state & push changes to database // onClick() edit button, change row to input boxes on Payee, Description, Category w/ current values as default render() { return ( {this.props.account.xpub}

{this.props.account.name}

{this.props.account.derivation}

 {this.props.account.notes} {new Date(this.props.account.birthday).toLocaleDateString()} {this.props.account.accounttype} sats {this.props.account.balance} sats
) } } // export default Account
